section.p: The administration of barium in enema form for radiographic study of the lower intestinal tract. Also called contrast enema. [Source: The American Heritage Stedman's Medical Dictionary]

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] bariumEnema with data type Code
The results of the diagnostic test BARIUM ENEMA. Possoble values are Not done; Positive; Negative; Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfBariumEnema with data type Point In Time
The date off the diagnostic test BARIUM ENEMA.

Contains exactly one [1..1] bariumEnema with data type Code
The results of the diagnostic test BARIUM ENEMA. Possoble values are Not done; Positive; Negative; Unknown/not documented; etc.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateOfBariumEnema with data type Point In Time
The date off the diagnostic test BARIUM ENEMA.
